Package ch.ethz.vizzly.util

Class Summary
DataAggregationUtil This class provides various functions for aggregating time series data.
GeoCoordConverter This class provides functions for converting geo coordinates as specified in GSN data streams to coordinates used by Google Maps.
LocationAggregationGrid This class implements a grid that is used for generating aggregated 2D maps.
LocationFilter This class provides two functions for filtering and aggregating time series by its included location information.
TimestampTruncateUtil This class provides a function for truncating timestamps.
VizzlySignalValidatorUtil This class provides functions for validating Vizzly signals that are specified by users and that may potentially contain errors.
